text: Mr. Abubakar Jaar was a guardian, and after the independence of Indonesia was appointed mayor of Padang.Asnan, Gusti, (2007), Memikir ulang regionalisme: Sumatera Barat tahun 1950-an, Yayasan Obor Indonesia, . Then he became a resident in North Sumatra.Husein, Ahmad, (1992), Sejarah perjuangan kemerdekaan R.I. di Minangkabau/Riau 1945-1950, Volume 1, Badan Pemurnian Sejarah Indonesia-Minangkabau, == References == == External links == * Category:Mayors of Padang Category:Minangkabau people
title: Abubakar Jaar
